name: Umair Sarfraz

quote.text: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.

intro: Hello, welcome to my personal website. I read and write code for a living. I have a very keen interest in software security. Some of my other areas of interest are software design patterns, automation, philosophy and political sciences. I also consider myself a sports fanatic. Cannot miss a week without playing football or basketball.
programming: Since early 2018, I have been working in the distributed ledger domain. Prior to that, I was actively involved in the development of service oriented solutions for cloud infrastructure.

publications.title: Privacy Aware IOTA Ledger: Decentralized Mixing and Unlinkable IOTA Transactions
Outsourcing IOTA Proof-of-Work to volunteer public devices
Blockchain-based Reputation System in Agri-Food Supply Chain
